name: coderabbit-convex
title: CodeRabbit with Convex
author: Ray <hi@rmncldyo.com>
description: Complete CodeRabbit integration with Convex database. Includes real-time sync, auth support, and schema definitions. Perfect for production apps.
docs: Get CODERABBIT_API_KEY from https://app.coderabbit.ai/settings/api-keys (requires Pro plan). Run 'npx convex dev' to get your Convex deployment URL. Import coderabbitReportsTable in your convex/schema.ts.
